alert.note: Alert for Northwest Greene; Southeast Greene; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington, east central Greene and Unicoi Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tusculum, or 10 miles northeast of Greeneville, moving southeast at 15 mph. Additional thunderstorms may develop to the south of this storm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greeneville, Erwin, Tusculum, Banner Hill, Telford, Leesburg, Chucky, Limestone, Embreeville and Davy Crockett Birthplace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Greene; Southeast Greene; Unicoi; Washington
